thread.title: NFL Network broadcasts nude Bengals players
thread.title_full: NFL Network broadcasts nude Bengals players

title: NFL Network broadcasts nude Bengals players
text:
NFL Network broadcasts nude Bengals players Undressing players seen in background of live interview POSTED: 12:14 PM EDT Oct 19, 2015 UPDATED: 12:16 PM EDT Oct 19, 2015 Large Text iStock/joecicak A live interview broadcast from the victorious Cincinnati Bengals' locker room on Sunday gave NFL Network viewers quite an eyeful. More from WDBJ7.com While correspondent Albert Breer interviewed Adam "Pacman" Jones following Cincinnati's 34-21 road victory over the Buffalo Bills, several of Jones' teammates could be seen undressing in the background of the live shot . The camera captured the naked buttocks of several Bengals players and at least some brief full frontal nudity. Meanwhile, the NFL GameDay Live anchors back in the studio could be heard stifling laughter. After the interview was over, one of the anchors can be heard saying, "Wowie zowie, what an interview" with another adding, "Yeah, that was interesting," before again breaking out in laughter. 
Breer himself also took the incident in stride, later retweeting one fan's comment with an embarrassed emoji. RT @Official_JCope : Now NFL Network has to be considered NSFW, thanks @AlbertBreer haha â€” Albert Breer (@AlbertBreer) October 19, 2015 Distributed by LAKANA. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
